thumb.name: Time Flies
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's Halloween.%3Cbr%3EJane%3Cbr%3EDo you want to know something scary?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EOnly 54 shopping days%3Cbr%3E'til Christmas!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Have Fun Trick-or-Treating
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA Halloween Wish%3Cbr%3Efor Someone Special.%3Cbr%3E Sandy%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're someone pretty special.%3Cbr%3Eand this year at trick-or-treat.%3Cbr%3ESure hope you have a lot of fun%3Cbr%3Eall up and down the street.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHave fun%3Cbr%3Etrick-or-treating!

thumb.name: Friendly Boo Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHey. Jenny %26#151;%3Cbr%3EBoo!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's only me%3Cbr%3EWith a friendly %26#147;BOO!%26#148;%3Cbr%3EJust to let you know%3Cbr%3EThat I'm thinking of you!
